otherNames: The New Adventures of Gigantor; Tetsujin 28-go (1980); New Tetsujin 28-go; Tetsujin 28-gou (1980); Tetsujin 28-go TV 2; New Gigantor; New Iron Man No.28; 鉄人２８号 (1980)
synopsis: Shotaro had become an Interpol agent, working with Branch Robo, the antirobot crime unit of that organization. He still employs Tetsujin.
